summary.span: Represents a collection of ordered objects returned from a query.

span.span: Represents a collection of ordered objects returned from a query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于包含 LINQ to 返回行的有序的数据集查询的结果。 is used to contain the results of a LINQ to DataSet query that returns an ordered sequence of rows. 这维护调用 LINQ 运算符对于原始查询状态，并且此状态用于构造谓词和排序表达式的任何后续。This maintains a state of call LINQ operators for the originating query, and this state is used to construct the predicate and sorting expressions for any subsequent . 不能直接实例化由于没有此类没有公共构造函数。An cannot be directly instantiated because there are no public constructors for this class.
